title: Image to MP4 Converter
description: Convert image sequence to MP4 video

upload.title: Upload Images
upload.dropzone: Drag & drop images here, or click to select
upload.supported: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, WebP, GIF

error.noImages: Please upload at least one image
error.unsupported: Your browser does not support WebCodecs API. Please use Chrome 94+, Firefox 111+, or Safari 16.4+.
error.encodingFailed: Video encoding failed. Please try again.
error.outOfMemory: Out of memory. Try reducing the number of images or using smaller resolution images.
error.encoderInit: Encoder initialization failed. Your browser may not support H.264 encoding.
